MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk, affecting properties in Beechbank and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 11:45am. Our engineers are contintuing to work on site to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:53pm on the Saturday, 23 January 2021.
